title: No. 54
credit_line: Patrons Art Fund: gift of Mr. and Mrs. George Magee Wyckoff
provenance_text:
Peter Brüning [1929-1970], Ratingen bei Düsseldorf, Germany; Galerie Aenne Abels, Cologne, Germany [1]; acquired by Department of Fine Arts, Carnegie Institute, Pittsburgh, PA, October 1961.

Notes:
[1]. The painting was included (no. 47) in "The 1961 Pittsburgh International Exhibition of Contemporary Painting and Sculpture" held at Carnegie Institute, Pittsburgh, PA, October 1961 - January 1962. It was lent by Galerie Aenne Abels.
[2]. The painting was purchased by Carnegie Institute from the International as a gift of Mr. and Mrs. George Magee Wyckoff, Sewickley, PA. Payment to Galerie Aenne Abels was sent on November 21, 1961.
